ProductInfo.Features:
Surveillance Security Setup DIY; 4 x Color Infrared illuminated IR Cameras; Real time remote monitoring. You need provide your own PC and monitor.
Dynamic IP acceptable; Internet security remote control
Image Compression Format: MPEG 4; Dynamic mask on motion-detection area of multi-camera (one ~ four); Can backup to the HD, CD-RW or DVD-RAM
Remote monitoring service center; Detection Sensitivity adjustment
Recyclable over ride of hard disk space on FIFO (Fist-in-Fist out)
